thread.title: VIDEO: Huntingdon's Mike Turk has no plans for beard

title: VIDEO: Huntingdon's Mike Turk has no plans for beard
text: Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest VIDEO: Huntingdon's Mike Turk has no plans for beard Huntingdon coach Mike Turk says he's unsure if he could even grow a beard, has no plans to do so and won't be competing with defensive lineman Drew Wallace. Post to Facebook VIDEO: Huntingdon's Mike Turk has no plans for beard Huntingdon coach Mike Turk says he's unsure if he could even grow a beard, has no plans to do so and won't be competing with defensive lineman Drew Wallace.
